titles.title: Providing for consideration of the concurrent resolution (H. Con. Res. 376) establishing the congressional budget for the United States Government for fiscal year 2007 and setting forth appropriate budgetary levels for fiscal years 2008 through 2011.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 109-405, by Mr. Putnam.
Rule provides for consideration of H. Con. Res. 376 with 4 hours of general debate.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 160.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 766.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 226 - 199 (Roll no. 91).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 225 - 196 (Roll no. 92).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 4/6/2006--Passed House without amendment. Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.Con.Res. 376 (establishing the congressional budget for the federal government for FY2007 and setting forth appropriate budgetary levels for FY2008-FY2011).
